page.title: 12PRENTON GOLF CLUB
page.content: {Prenton Golf Club}is a private members club, the entrance of which is to be found at the top of Golf Links Road on the right hand side. There are about seven hundred {members}which include full playing members, social members, non playing members and veterans. Both men and women are included in the above categories. The club organises many{competitions such as the Captains Prize, the presentation of which incorporates a dance and barbecue. Matches are also played against other golf clubs. Social events that take place include Christmas carol concerts, New Year Dance and St Andrew's Day Dance. Other social events offered by the club include snooker and bridge.
